description:
Compress your pictures up to 90% without visible quality loss

Caesium is an image compression software that helps you store, send and share digital pictures, supporting JPG, PNG and WebP formats. You can quickly reduce the file size (and resolution, if you want) by preserving the overall quality of the image.
Note
This might be the latest version of the v2 cycle. I'm starting to work to the v3.0.0 version to address a lot of suggestions, feature requests and general improvements. You can participate in the development in this discussion thread.
Bugfixes
- Fix #336 - Fix to font not showing correctly
